tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Amrithlal treated my brother for sciatica at Vikram Hospital, Bangalore. 
Dr. Amrithlal was very friendly, patient and explained the entire process of surgery and recovery. He did not for once pressure us to do more than was needed. 
I was especially impressed by his willingness to meet and answer all the questions we had. 
He eventually performed a successful surgery. The intense pain with sciatica has completed vanished. Thank You, Dr. Amrithal. You are indeed the type of doctor that I would want for not just my brother but for my entire family. 

I would recommend Dr. Amrithal without a doubt. 

Vaseem Anjum
California

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have been visiting Dr. Amrithlal from 2010. At first when I visited him, I had L4-L5 disc bulge issue that impacted left foot activity. When all other doctors suggested, surgery is the only option, he had solved my problem with out surgery. From then, he has become single point of contact for all my family/friends, who has disc issues.

Doctor had operated my mother twice for spine issue. ******* *** ********* *** *** ***********
It was very tough time for us to handle as the doctor was suggesting one more surgery to make my mother health fine. It was like doctor was experimenting all the possible solution on my mother. However his initial analysis on the problem was good. Staff is friendlAnyway I wish the doctor a great success.
Doctor gave enough time, but wasn't satisfied with the treatment. I visited for my dad's back pain *** **** **** * **** *** ******* ** ********** ** *** ****

Doctor is very good I visited him by seeing his reviews in practo.com, I would recommend the doctor to my family and friends, he listened to my problems and after that, he wrote some medicines to me he recommended to take MRI scan an all, the medicines what he prescribed was working but now am thinking to visit again because the pain started again, he understands the problem very well and listen carefully after that prescribed me for walking daily due to lack of time am not doing that because of that pain started so I need to visit again.
Till now I have seen many doctors, nobody able tofind the issue for back pain, He quickly identified it and started the medicines. Avoided surgery. He is very polite. I would like to recommend him

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ********* ******* his precise analysis and identification of problem and solution to be provided gave my mother Geetha Kumari another life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been consulting with Dr. Amrithlal since 2015 when I first had my spinal chord injury. He was extremely patient and practical in explaining the problem in detail and what I should to do to manage my condition better and avoid surgery. Very friendly and puts patient needs first!

The experience was good again I will this doctor for a checkup, visited for slip disk problem, he was listening to our problems, I have recommended the doctor to others, am happy with the explanation of health issue given by the doctor, am satisfied with the doctor and his consultation

Met the doctor consultation was excellent, he was listening to our problems, we are happy with the consultation, nothing as such that I want to improve, sure I would like to recommend the doctor, doctor behaviour is very good, he is a very good doctor, he prescribes and be calm, ** ****** **** ***** he did gave time for the consultation.
